scripts.build: yarn build:createRenderer && yarn build:createStaticRenderer && yarn build:startRenderer
scripts.build:createRenderer: rimraf createRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/createRenderer --out-dir createRenderer && yarn prettier createRenderer/*
scripts.watch:createRenderer: rimraf createRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/createRenderer --out-dir createRenderer -w
scripts.build:createStaticRenderer: rimraf createStaticRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/createStaticRenderer --out-dir createStaticRenderer && yarn prettier createStaticRenderer/*
scripts.watch:createStaticRenderer: rimraf createStaticRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/createStaticRenderer --out-dir createStaticRenderer -w
scripts.build:startRenderer: rimraf startRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/startRenderer --out-dir startRenderer && yarn prettier startRenderer/*
scripts.watch:startRenderer: rimraf startRenderer && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=production babel src/startRenderer --out-dir startRenderer -w
